resources:
Log Activity Start Log Activity Mood Record Choose Your Activity Start Stop In order to record an already finished activity Add For the past 24 hours, I’ve been feeling, on average. . . Satisfied Dissatisfied Restless Calm Unwell Well Strained Relaxed No Energy Full Energy Sleepy Awake Have you experienced one or more negative events since the last query? How intense was the most significant negative event? No result Very Intense Have you experienced one or more positive events since the last query? How intense was the most significant positive event? No result Very Intense Are you now alone? Yes No When you think of the people around you, how does the following statement apply? I don’t like these people! Not at all Completely true What people are you surrounded by right now? Done Where are you now? At present I am satisfied with myself Right now, I think I’m a failure. Note: 0: not applicable at all; to 9 fully applicable to submit 0 just click on (submit). Submit Submit Since the last query, I have been angry or aggressive towards another person, which I regret afterwards. Since the last query, I have acted impulsively, that is, I have acted without worrying about the possible consequences. Not at all Completely true Not at all Completely true Finish Settings Choose your own language Go to HomeScreen "How often do you want to take the quiz?" Set your own reminder Note: this will set the alarms for the reminders automatically Cancel all alarms Cancel Select Time Set How often would you like to receive the Daily Query?
